full_text: The Supreme Court reinstated a Trump-era policy that requires asylum applicants to wait in Mexico while their claims are evaluated by U.S. authorities https://t.co/aTd9tbGnXF

localize.full_text: 最高裁は、亡命申請者が米国当局の評価を受ける間、メキシコで待つことを義務付けるトランプ時代の政策を復活させた https://t.co/aTd9tbGnXF
